title: Data File Structure
content:
Structure Management The required fields are necessary for successful Data Import. When the column headers in the source file are renamed to the database name listed in the table below auto mapping of the headers will occur. This minimizes the time spent on performing column mapping in the �Transform� screen in Data Management. Please note that although the L1 data structure is able to import fields that have higher length limits than listed below, data processing will fail.
Chart of Accounts (GLA) file General Ledger Account Balances (GLAB) file Journal Entry Transactions (JET) file

title: KPMG Clara CAATs Document
content:
Purpose KPMG Clara Computer Assisted Audit Techniques (CAATs) Document is designed to assist the engagement team with documenting the procedures performed on data used in KPMG Clara’ s Advanced Capabilities.
Document   Download files   KPMG Clara Computer Assisted Audit Techniques.docx  (24 ko)   KPMG Clara Computer Assisted Audit Techniques.pdf  (45 ko)
